name: Crystal Glide Lipstick
details: Crystal Glide Lipstick is a long-lasting, super-pigmented lipstick formula contains a moisturizing Aloe Vera-base to help protect the lips from signs of aging. Rich mineral pigments offer amazing color payoff while hydrating lips.
ingredients: Ricinus communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Tricaprylin, Octyldodecanol, Silica, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Mica (CI 77019), CI 19140 (FD&C Yellow 5), Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Calcium Aluminium Borosilicate, CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77499 (Black Iron Oxide), CI 45410 (D&C Red No 28), Tin Oxide (CI 77861).
description: Bodyography’s smooth, creamy classic lipstick is saturated with mineral-based super pigments to keep your color fresh for hours.
Our classic lipstick has a moisturizing aloe vera base, to keep your lips plump and help fight signs of aging around the delicate skin of your mouth.

reviews.name: Olivia M.
reviews.content: It is so easy to apply and it lasts all day. I have been using it for a few weeks now and I am very happy with it.

reviews.name: Mindy W.
reviews.content: This color is very versatile for all clothing and love the matte look!

name: Bronze Liquid Eyeshadow
details: A head-turning, long-wear liquid eyeshadow that delivers vibrant, high-shimmer color in a comfortable, crease-proof formula.
description: Infused with pure color pigments & crystal chrome pearls for intense color

Crystal Glide Liquid Eyeshadow is a weightless, yet intensely-playful, long-lasting liquid eye shadow that will saturate your lids in liquid-chrome-shine for up to 24 hours! This innovative technology delivers vibrant, intense color for a buildable, no-feel finish.
Can be used as an eyeliner to create sultry looks
ingredients: Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Beeswax, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Alcohol, Propylene Carbonate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol.

reviews.name: Mia Smith
reviews.content: I love this eyeshadow! The color is amazing on my skin tone and very easy to apply. I don’t think I’ll ever go back to powder eyeshadow!

reviews.name: Monica L.
reviews.content: Beautiful. Perfect for a dewy fresh face look with a hint of glam or dressed up. Getting more colors.
